title: NBA, Prince, T.I., Democrats, Trump and more.
itunes:title: NBA, Prince, T.I., Democrats, Trump and more.
description:
Happy Friday.  Check out Ask Steve to learn more about his creed and code.  Kyle Lowry of the Toronto Raptors was shoved by Warriors minority owner.  Uncle Steve has very fond memory involving Prince, Mariah and Patti LaBelle.  The family of T.I. are upset with the story TMZ reported about the cause of death of his sister Precious.  Big Dog gets a question that is related to yesterday's Strawberry Letter.  The Democrats are wondering should they start impeachment proceedings for Trump.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reminds us not to lose faith in the face of adversity, plus more.  Have a great weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
